message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. I'm a bit tight on budget, but I really like the product and think it's worth it.
